text_block_list.text:
It was the day after the event. Vodka hadn't 
shown up for training for the first time.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's Vodka's trainer. …Is she not here?
choice_data_list: Do you know where she is?
Do you know where she is?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Ah… I think it's by the river. I've read about 
it in manga, but if it's going to get dark, it 
has to be over there.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
”This kind of thing is cool, isn't it?” You 
really are an idiot.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I know you're grumbling, but make sure 
you bring her along. If she's wilting, 
we won't be able to compete.
I thank Daiwa Scarlet and head to the riverbed.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh… Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Shut up, I know that. …I'm skipping today!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I told you to shut up! Leave me alone!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I don't……want to……!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
…I thought I'd do it. I was seriously going to 
win! I'm going to beat Brian!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But……when I actually ran, I was so overwhelmed…… 
I was so exhausted at the end……!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ………I thought, 'I'm done for.'

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
The race I saw! Not a single one of them left 
Derby… They didn't give up halfway through!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Trainers… I wonder if I'm no good.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I've been like this since before my debut… I 
wonder if I'll ever be cool…!?

Vodka seems to have completely lost confidence. 
I want to cheer her up somehow, but……

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I know you're grumbling, but make sure 
you bring her along. If she's wilting, 
we won't be able to compete.

Come to think of it, why did Daiwa 
Scarlet say that? Didn't she want 
to tell Vodka something too…?
choice_data_list: Anyway, let's go to the course, vodka.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh? No, that's why I…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, hey! Don't push me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hah… Oh, vodka.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Scarlet.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Didn't you say you were going to turn it off 
today? You said you'd focus on resting because 
it's the day after the competition…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hmph. …I wanted to change my plans, okay?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
A certain idiot took a head-on bite 
from an opponent with a difference in 
skill… It was a high-speed race from 
the beginning, but she was late.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
And yet, you accelerated in a straight line… I 
couldn't lose to you.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …! Scarlet, you…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Well, I have some training to do.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
What's with her……? She can't lose……? Because 
I'm…… so lame……!!
choice_data_list: You looked cool when you tried.
You looked cool when you tried.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: But! In the end, I gave up…!
choice_data_list: What's important is what to do now, isn't it?
What's important is what to do now, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: From now on…?
choice_data_list: It's up to you to end this lame.
It's up to you whether it ends lazily or not.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's up to me… I… I… …!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ――Trainer! I have a request!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Give me… a chance for revenge!!

――After that, Vodka devoted herself to training 
more than usual.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
There you are, Scarlet! Come 
on, let's run together!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Don't say that out of the blue. I don't 
have any plans…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It's fine, just one! C'mon, let's go!! C'mon, 
let's go, let's go!!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hey!? …Wait up, youuuuuuuuuuuuuu!!
And a few days later…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Nice to meet you, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph. Come, I'll tear you to pieces.

Vodka retaliated with Naritabrian, and 
challenged her to a one-on-one duel!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Heh…!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Guuuh…!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(Damn it… Damn iiit! It's so fast! Crap! I can't 
keep up with this, I almost think…!!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Raaaaaaaaah!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (I won't give up! I won't give up!!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (I'll…… pierce through the 『cool』 I think I am!!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Daaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!
The one who won the match was Naritablyan.

However, Vodka continued to devour the “monster” 
magnificently until the very end…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You're funny. …Let's run again.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ah…! Th-Thank you, Senpai!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Trainer… Heheh, thanks!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …I'm going to get even cooler. Don't let me go!
